[02:16.000]

[02:39.000]Take my hand
[02:42.500]
[02:44.000]How long must we bear this sadness in the world this chaos
[02:50.000]We don't know what we should do
[02:53.000]I believe that justice can be found
[02:56.000]Be brave keep your chin up
[03:00.000]Did you hit the cross roads in your life?
